actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that comprehensive tax reform legislation should include incentives for companies to repatriate foreign earnings for the purpose of creating new jobs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that innovative proposals to create new American jobs, such as repatriation, should be considered in the 112th Congress as part of comprehensive tax reform.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that comprehensive tax reform legislation should include incentives for companies to repatriate foreign earnings for the purpose of creating new jobs.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that comprehensive tax reform legislation should include incentives for companies to repatriate foreign earnings for the purpose of creating new jobs.
